Title: Falling to Pieces
Description:
Why would the saurok have amber? More importantly, why would Oracle Hiss'ir be so protective of it?

It is unlikely this came from the heavily guarded Zan'vess, so where did it come from?

Perhaps the Klaxxi will know what to make of it.
ObjectivesText: Return the Glowing Amber to Kaz'tik the Manipulator.
RewardText:
You were wise to bring this to us. This is a piece of another paragon's encasing amber.

The damage suggests the paragon may be in trouble.

I will speak with the council to decide what should be done next.
